name: Modern Mac
description: Welcome to the new age of “Mac.” ‘Later,’ dairy! We’ve ramped up cheesy creaminess with nooch (aka nutritional yeast). It not only packs serious flavour, but it’s also rich in vitamin B12 for a boost of energy and better brain power. Kid- and student-approved!

ingredients.name: unsweetened oat milk, or milk of your choice

preparation: Cook macaroni in a pot according to package directions, then drain.

Meanwhile, place seasoning in large, microwave-safe measuring cup or bowl. Gradually whisk in milk, 1⁄4 cup at a time, whisking well between additions. Microwave, uncovered, on high 4–5 min, or until creamy.
Stir butter into cooked pasta. Stir in sauce; it will thicken as it sits.
tips: Before serving, stir in 1 cup frozen peas or steamed broccoli florets. Call the florets “trees” and you may even tempt kids to eat broccoli!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup sliced veggies.

products.name: Modern Mac Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Modern Mac is the best nut-and-dairy-free, vegan version of creamy mac & cheese out there! Free from gluten, dairy, nuts, soy, mustard, onion, garlic, and sugar, this seasoning makes a deliciously thick, velvety sauce with a touch of nooch (nutritional yeast). Make it your way with the milk and pasta of your choice and enjoy a tasty modern take on classic comfort food.
